item.description:
"Decisions, Responsibility, and the Brain" by Patricia
Churchland of
the University of California, a prominent neurophilosopher. A
free
public lecture presented by the Humanist Chaplaincy at Harvard,
the
Harvard Secular Society, and the Center for Naturalism.

When: Wednesday, November 30, 8 pm
Where: Emerson Hall, Room 105, Harvard Yard, Cambridge.
Wheelchair
accessible.
For further information call Thomas Clark, 617-480-8846, or
Greg
Epstein, 617-495-5986.



For more information, see http://www.naturalism....
item.name: patricia churchland lecture
